sentence: "I heard and believed the lies the Democrats and Liz Cheney's friends in the media were telling at the time, but that is ancient history as I quickly realized that their allegations against President Trump were untrue," she said.
author: Joseph Choi -
title: Cheney challenger wins Wyoming Republican activists' straw poll

sentence: Wyoming Republican Harriet Hageman, endorsed by former President Donald Trump, showed a commanding lead against the Democrat-allied Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) in a Saturday straw poll full of House candidates held by the Wyoming Republican State Central Committee.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Liz Cheney Loses Wyoming Straw Poll to Trump-Backed Harriet Hageman

sentence: The Republican National Committee (RNC) will reportedly move forward with a resolution on Friday to censure Reps. Liz Cheney (R-WY) and Adam Kinzinger (R-IL) for their conduct on the January 6 committee.
author: Paul Bois
title: Republican National Committee Will Vote Friday to Censure Liz Cheney, Adam Kinzinger

sentence: Wyoming Republican Representative Liz Cheney raised a personal fundraising record of $2.94 million for the first quarter of 2022, according to a Monday report.
author: Jon Jackson
title: Trump's Fears About Liz Cheney Race May Be Coming True

author: Noah Y. Kim
title: Liz Cheney Is Getting a Ton of MoneyFrom People Who Can't Vote for Her

sentence: Harriet has my Complete and Total Endorsement in replacing the Democrats' number one provider of sound bites, Liz Cheney,? Trump wrote at the time.
author: Charlie Spiering
title: Donald Trump Announces Rally with Liz Cheney Challenger Harriet Hageman in Casper, Wyoming

sentence: The loss also likely underscored to Trump the importance of his declared strategy for defeating GOP Representative Liz Cheney of Wyoming.
author: Jon Jackson
title: Nebraska Primary Gives Trump Reason to Worry About Liz Cheney Race
